Sheet1.Original text: "Enneracts resurface every now and then. Most lucky finders, not knowing better, will resell them to be siphoned into energy crystals that will fuel weapons or industries. Scholars have theorized that they may contain a small fragment of a divine entity's power, stored in an ancient but definitely manmade device. While mages may spend their life studying a few Enneracts to replicate their signature essence and cast spells, a select few people are however drawn to these, able to absorb the energy within and make it theirs in an instant."
Perform a basic attack with your equipped weapon.
Punch your foes like your life depends on it!
A Republican Instructor once told you: "So you're good at throwing punches eh? Great. Now pick-up a weapon or go home". Which was a little ironic given the military academy was your only home.
Performs a powerful Melee combo with your Shield and equipped weapon.
Slice, hack, or smash foes with your main hand weapon.
Humans' creativity knows no bounds when it comes to inventing tools of slaughter. The only thing that matches that inspiration, is their will to do it in a stylish and effective way.
Unleash a flurry of blows with both of your weapons.

Traditional fighters tend to only consider the shield as the superior option. Clearly they have never fought the Screaming Furies of Laibon: A regiment of women dual wielding kopeshes while shouting death away.
Swing your two handed sword to slash down your foes.

At the military academy your strategy teacher rambled times and times again about the battle of Samatras. The Kuei empire's light cavalry spotted a regiment of Republican footmen isolated from the rest of the battle. A swift sweep should have been enough to break the poor infantry... except they were greatsword wielders. That day, the Republican army had horsemeat for dinner.
Maul your enemies down with your two handed mace.

A jest only truly appreciated by battlehammer users: "Before a tournament, a knight spends two hours turtling behind three layers of thick fullplate armor. Scared of being late, he hurries in the arena and asks his unarmoured challenger "What time is it?", the lowborn picks up his maul and answers: "It's hammer time!".
Swing your two handed axe to cut down your foes.
Some see fighting as a dance, an art, a poetic vision of murder. Meanwhile, others wield a big fat greataxe and chop people in half as casually as a butcher cuts meat. To each their own.
Unleash a flurry of blows with two daggers.

Killers, murderers, sociopaths and assassins all seem to share an unhealthy fetish for knives. Some researshers tried to understand this phenomenon. Their endeavour did not yield any conclusive results given that half of them gave up after the first half got slaughtered, all with a similar cause of death: multiple stabbings.
Fire at your foes with a crystal pistol.
There's an old saying in the explorer's guild of Stormfall: "Do not bring a sword to a gunfight".
Fire at your foes with two crystal pistols.

In the independent city of Archion there used to be an academy to learn sophisticated fighting stances with two pistols. The training was so intense that people could be gone for years without being seen again. The world later learned that the academy got closed. Apparently its masters were hidding the bodies of an absurdly high amount of students dead to self-inflicted injuries.
Execute a deadly barrage of blows and shots.

After several drinks of liquor, Captain James, a skypirate known for his famous heist against the flying city of Archion, will often share his wisdom with the newbloods in his crew: "Alrigh' gather 'round ya silly skyvirgins! Listen to me y'all! Like oi always say, victory ain't 'bout the size of yar canons, nah it ain't, but tis all 'bout...", and that's generally when he passes out.
The great equalizer. A lord on his highhorse, a knight with a castleforged sword, or a pitchfork wielding peasant will all share the same fate once showered with arrows.
Tap into the staff's power to cast projectiles.
Charges into battle? Muddy skirmishes? Gory eviscerations? These are peasants practices at best. Exterminating your foes from afar with magic is just more stylish... and cleaner.
Let loose a volley of arrows on a circular area, damaging enemies over time as long as they remain in it.\n\nOnly usable with bows and pistols.
Hephaäron the Maestre of industry forged "Krearion, The First Bow" so that men could master the art of raining death.
Throw a spinning dualblade in a front line, damaging those caught in its path.\n\nAttack : Only usable with daggers, bows and pistols.

Hephaäron, Primordial of Industry, forged "Omeagram,The First Double Bladed Sword", to push humans to their limits in terms of grace and agility. Manipulating this weapon can be as deadly for its wielder as it is for its foes.
Summon a colossal hammer and bring it down on your foes, doing area damage.\n\nAttack : Only usable with melee weapons.
Hephaäron, Primordial of Industry, forged "Gaavanir,The First Hammer" to shatter bones and will alike. Only dust and despair remain in its wake.
Electrocute your foes with bouncing lightning. Each bounce is weaker that the last.\n\nSpell : Only usable with staves or catalysts.

Beelmalik, the fallen Lord of Punishment, used to rule over the primal element of lightning. He kept a distinct taste for chaining attacks, symbol of his desire to capture and emprison his brethren Abanazar, Lord of Envy, and Etheliel, Lady of Vanity.
Ice agglomerates above your enemies. After a short delay, it crashes upon them for huge damage.\n\nSpell : Only usable with staves or catalysts.
Etheliel, the fallen Lady of Vanity sheds deadly frozen tears whenever she is confronted with the world's decay. Ruthless sorcerers learned to leverage her sorrow into chilling death.
After a delay, hurls an ice shard in a line.\n\nSpell : Only usable with staves or catalysts.

Etheliel, the fallen Lady of Vanity, despises the use of ice as vulgar projectiles. The victims get impaled in atrocious ways which she cannot condone: they should be frozen instantly. Unfortunately few sorcerers actually care about these considerations.
An ice nova emanates from you and freezes your enemies.\n\nSpell : Only usable with staves or catalysts.
Etheliel, the fallen Lady of Vanity, wants to cover the world in ice to preserve it. Freezing foes and friends alike to trap their beauty, forever.
Channel a beam of Aether in front of you, damaging your foes.\n\nSpell : Only usable with staves or catalysts.

Anulai-Tai, the fallen Duke of Time is not nicknamed "The last Morrow" for no reason, channeling that much of his pure Aether energy always constitutes a danger to the fabric of time, and even moreso to those standing into it.
Summons a giant spear and leap down on your enemies, damaging them.\n\nAttack : Only usable with melee weapons.
Hephaäron, the Maestre of industry forged "Ishmir, The First Spear" to teach men to work together on the battlefield. True warriors however will use this versatile weapon with lethal efficiency.
Bless an area around you with the light of dawn, it heals over time while standing in it.\n\nSpell : Only usable with staves or catalysts.
Anathëa, Lady of Dawn, can bring her light in the darkest dephts, warming the heart of those fighting the perils of the night. Brothers of Dawn are ever thankful of her protection.
Summon an imposing bow and launch several piercing arrows at once.\n\nAttack : Only usable with bows and pistols.
Hephaäron, the Maestre of Industry, forged "Krearion, The First Bow" by merging the power of a tidal wave and the accuracy of a lightning strike.
Unleash a powerful warcry which buffs attack speed and cast speed for allies and yourself around you.\n\nOnly usable with melee weapons.
Baäpheth, Fallen Archduke of War, one of the nine shadows of the world, is the father of all warriors. Channeling his power grants the ferocity needed to survive a battlefield.

Krearion was forged with the ability to soak up the surrounding static energy and release it as sheer force whenever unleashing arrow volleys. The energy generated by the projectiles create a virtuous loop that allows a faster recharge of its attacks.

Abanazaar, once Primordial of fire, ravaged a continent seeking for his love interest, his envy was consuming and melting everything as the ground itself would twirl and turn into lava in his wake.\n\nWhile Hephaäron was his enemy, he was no fighter but an opportunist. He got to work, installing a forge near the melting continent and shaping its burning metals into superdense flaming arrowheads meant to feed the mouth of Krearion.
Adds a slowing effect in the area.

The wonders of innovation. Serrating arrowheads allowed for an alternative to flesh-penetration: should the projectile fail to pierce, it could now tear and peel the flesh of its victim. While it might not be lethal, warriors with shredded leg-muscles see their mobility reduced to an agonizing crawl, and at that point, they are as good as dead.
All the damage is now dealt directly, but reduced overall damage.

Scholars and logisticians have theorized that the impact of sustained fire on a specific battlefield area has gigantic disminishing returns in terms of efficiency. Accuracy and restraint allows for a more strategical approach that saves a considerable amount of ressources for roughly similar results.

Sarisel, the Primordial of Purity used Omeagram as an option to dispatch greater amounts of foes, littering the floor with the heads and limbs of those that were to be sanctified. While the weapon's blades were usually covered in gore, the deathbringer would however always remain untouched by the filth of the world.
The projectile now does a circle based on the cursor's location.

When Abanazaar, once Primordial of fire, crossed an ocean to meet with his love interest, it created a gigantic cyclone made of scorching steam. It is said that to tame the cyclone, Hephaäron started forging Omeagram inside of it to funnel its power into it.

After a while, every assassin learn to know and cherish each dent in his blade, every stripe, even the scent of its metal covered in fresh blood. A bond is forged between the killer and his lethal companion. This link will have the wielder manipulate his gear without having to think about it, like an extension of himself. This is what it takes to manipulate Omeagram to its full potential.

The edges of Omeagram were keened with such precision that Hephaäron boasted its ability to go through matter if thrown with enough might. While no-one questionned the terrifying sharpness of the blades, there was still no voluntary to test the claim with its own body.

When Hephaäron forged Gaavanir, he lended this dreaded weapon to Baäpheth, once Primordial of Ambition, to boast his own achievement. He wielded it with such power that craters and volcanos still serve as memories of the lands he scarred.

Trial and error is a mortal concern: Primordials define what is and what isn't, there is no room for improvements when things are absolute. Which explains Hephaäron's distress when Baäpheth prompted him to improve Gaavanir's design with a better balance of the handle.

When he finished the second design of Gaavanir, Hephaäron took the opportunity to improve even further the concussion on impact. There was no way he would let Baäpheth be the final word on how to improve the first hammer.
Improved critical chance on stunned enemies.

Gaavanir slumbers in the Armory of creation. It's very existence inspired the concept of battlehammers to craftsmen and blacksmiths around the world. Ever since, battlefields have been littered with broken skulls and crushed rib cages.

At its glory days, the Upheaval-Tribunal was a mythic structure that used to be permanently caught in freezing blizzards, thundering storms, and flowing lava. Now, only Beelmalik remains in its halls. With the embodiment of lightning as its magistrate, its judgements have never been so swift and numerous.
Reduced damage loss on each bounce.

Beelmalik's concept of Justice is rather approximative. Time does not wash away the sins, deeds are absolute and context superfluous which makes mercy absent from considerations. The result is that punishment takes a central place in his every judgement.

Beelmalik used to form the same entity with Abanazar and Etheliel. They were the Primordial of Change, ruling over the Upheaval-Tribunal. Ever since they splitted, Beelmalik has been obssessed with chasing and assimilating his brethren to be whole again.

As twisted and obsessive as Beelmalik can be, he still counts as a "Conciliator": a fallen trying to repair his past deeds against creation. His path to redemption may lead him to capture his two fallen brethren, Abanazar and Etheliel, and merge to become once again the Primordial of Change.

Etheliel has always been plagued by this thought: all beings aspire to live, but the very fact of living is a self-corrupting endeavour. Beautiful creatures wither and die, ideals become crooked and betray themselves, ideas are forgotten and lost to the ages. Everything is distorted by time.

Those who want to make a pact with Etheliel go through a disturbing ceremony known as the "Crystal salvation". The aspirant inoculates himself a dose of poison called 'Withering Roses" inside his forearm. As the first symptoms appear: black petals on the skin, the cultist has to stop the venom by freezing his arm forever or face an agonizing death.

Together, Abanazar, Beelmalik, and her used to be the Primordial of Change. But she is the one that stirred the first seeds of individualism deep within the Primordial's psychë, inciting her brethren to develop their own will. Her plan was so successful that the master-being crumbled under the weight of its own egos, splitting into three entities.
Longer creation delay but increased damage.

While no-one knows precisely where to find Etheliel, myths tell the story of a freezing wail among the tall mountains that link the three continents of Wolcen. An echo so strong that it seems to mourn creation itself.

Tricking the fallen of Vanity into making her believe that you are a gateway for her will is a dangerous endeavour: A group of her cultists known as the Diamond Legion hunts down and capture usurpers, afflicting them with a frozen eternal torment.

According to Etheliel, there's nothing as biting as the realization of a lost prime, a zenith that belongs in the past and from which things will only ever go downhill. That feelings alone can pierce the heart, wreck the mind, and lacerate willpower. The edges of her icicles are shaped by that omnipotent feeling.
Frozen foes killed by Artic Spear explode in shards, damaging nearby enemies.

Etheliel is not just hateful against the usurpers of her freezing powers, she becomes absolutely frenzied when she confronts sorcerers that dare to summon her powers to shred and tear apart the beauty of creation. Ironically, dreadful destructive blizzards spread around her when she loses control and exact her vengeance.
Longer creation delay but increased damage.

Ezaneal, fallen Lord of Trickery, seduced Etheliel to funnel her powers into an experimental device known as the Planetcracker. A siege weapon so powerful that it could hurl entire comets at its foes. Upon realizing she was being manipulated, she destroyed the Planetcracker and their cults have been at war ever since. Yet, the experiment proved that with enough power one could literally fire comets at his foes.

The ice of the lady of Vanity has lost its natural purity since she became a Fallen. Now it is filled with sadness, remorse, and a lethal determination to spread over the world. Woe to the fools that would mistake her unholy touch with the natural colds of winter.

Hidden temples of Etheliel are haunting sights: their chilling halls display all types of frozen creatures that were brought there for 'immortality' by cultists. In order to obtain her favors, the cultists have unholy rituals at the heart of the temple where they freeze captured young and beautiful people as sacrifice.

Etheliel knows generosity when it comes to sharing her power with mortals: she sees sorcerers and cultists as mere pawns serving her great ambition whenever they summon her cold embrace. Everytime her frost touches the world, she moves one step closer to her ultimate victory. In a way, ignorant sorcerers are just as dangerous as malignant cultists.

To freeze their abducted tributes while in their prime beauty, cultists of Etheliel are not allowed to harm them. But worst than that, tributes must not feel fear, wrath or anguish during the sacrifice ritual: these emotions distort the human face which would result in a refused offering from their mistress.

The fallen of Infinity has the power to reap and sever the bond between matter and time, leaving everything in his wake in a standstill state with no beginning nor end. His dominion over time is absolute just like his will to reach all things that move and bring them a motionless rest.
Increased number of ticks over time.

The cult of Infinity is a very dangerous one, their deadliest agents known as "Time Devourers", have specialized into isolating a foe from its normal bond to time, before discharging a tremendous amount of Aether unto the target. It accelerates its biorythm so much that a mortal will grow old and die by the end of the channeling.
Gradually increased damage over time while channeling.

Motionlessness is a key element in the training of Anulai-Tai's cultists. The flow of time brings movement and movement brings destruction which should be prevented. To obtain his favors, they must learn immuability, reducing their metabolism to a crawl and losing track of the flow of time, no beginning, no end just a blurry sense of being.

In his madness, Anulai-Tai feels all the movements in the world and their destructive nature, like a fuzzy haze of blasphemy toward creation. His gaze puncture through that haze, piercing space and flesh, seeking for targets to single out and lay to rest.
Has a chance to stun on impact.

Deep within every creature there is the terror to stop existing. A buried feeling so strong that it can turn the fiercest foe into a simple prey. The shadow of a warrior diving on its enemies while holding Ishmir can awaken that primal conditionnement, shattering the fighting spirit of those about to die.

The sight of the spear's head piercing the flesh, the painful deathrattle of the skewered foe, its warm blood splattering the face of the impaler: madmen and berserkers thirst for these grim omens to create an unstoppable momentum of destruction.

Hephaäron forged magical neck rings for Anathëa the Lady of Dawn. With them, her voice of pure light was imbued and became the Searing Song, allowing her to pierce the darkest nights. In return she gave him a single bright smile, which he immortalized by infusing its sacred shimmer into the blade of Ishmir.

Baäpheth, former Primordial of ambition had a single training session with Ishmir. In the midst of the fight, he threw it with such power that it fended an entire mountain. Since then, the earth itself reacts strongly whenever The First Spear touches the ground.
Area is now centered at cursor location.

The Brotherhood of Dawn worships Anathëa. Even after being chased from the Kingdom of Alia once the United Republic of Mankind took over, they stayed true to their oaths and remained powerful knights shielding innocents from the terrors of the night.

The lady of Dawn is a benevolant Primordial who defends creation against the fallens. She rules over the concepts of Dawn, Hope, Truth, and Rebirth. She tries to sheperd mankind into her humbling lights while giving it the powers to survive against supernatural invasions.
Grants an armor bonus while inside the area.

Facing the injustice and perils of the world, some have lost faith in Anathëa's existence on the claim that through recorded history, she never intervened herself to help creation. Some Brothers chose to fight-off this faithlessness by becoming "Hierophants of the Searing Song", battlepriests that teach her prayers and blessings to shield mankind from evil.
Grants sacred damage to Attacks while standing in the area.

Among Brothers of Dawn, a squire may try to become an Aurora Knight. On the way to this iconic title, an aspirant will have to take five oaths. There is a period of observation inbetween oaths to make sure the candidate is up to the engagement. Upon taking the last, a great deed to defend mankind must be accomplished, only then, will the title be his.

At first, Krearion inspired craftsmen around the four realms to build portable ballistas. Only the strongest men could draw the bow, and the manoeuverabilty of these archers was questionnable at best. Since then, a lighter more 'human' version was conceived: the longbow.

Before Krearion got stored into the Armory of creation, no men ever had the idea of swift ranged weapons that could rain mayhem on your foes. Since then, successive crushing defeats taught generals to stop relying on heavy cavalry to win their war.
Reduced amount of projectiles but increased damage.

Sarisel, Primordial of Purity and born hunter of evil, saw potential in that new weapon: a tool to bring down his foes with minimal effort. The way he wields it obeys its own logic: shoot to kill. Each arrow must count and reap a reward or the power spent to shoot it is a lost expense.

Baäpheth used to be the Primordial of Ambition before falling and taking the aspect of War. He was the first to understand the consequences of bowmen on the battlefield. Arrow volleys do not have to kill, the constant despair and mayhem they spread in enemy ranks is where a battle is won.
Grants rage per enemy hit by the shout and improved rage per hit for the duration of the skill.

Conquerors have one simple rule to limit casualties during battle: always give an escape route to the opposing army. If their moral is broken, the soldiers will grasp at every straw they can to get out of the chaos, their ranks will break as they run for the exit.\n\nBut what happens to those that gave up on survival altogether? True berserkers cannot be broken, controlled, or contained. The raging chaos they bring in their wake is the terror of every would-be strategist.
Enemies hit by the shout gain stacks of "weakened".

During the great war of the Primordials, Baäpheth engaged and fought against Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. The First Warrior's prowess could not be match in battle, but Anathëa's raw power was so great he could not overpower her.\n\nIn the end, Baäpheth had the upper hand and wounded Anathëa, some of her lights escaped her body uncontrolably, engulfing and searing Baäpheth in and out. Both were considerably weakened by the experience and unable to give the final blow.
Grants bonus armor per enemy hit by the shout.

Before becoming the fallen of War, Baäpheth used to be the Primordial of Ambition. Part of his ubris came from his willingness to embody the perfect warrior. To be a figure that others could look-up to at the darkest time. When others would consider breaking the line, he would not relent and command them to stand with him. Most would mistake his quest for glory for an heroïsm that never was.
Stun foes in a small radius.

Baäpheth is a born conqueror. But far from being a mindless battlebeast, he turned to be a patient strategist. He understands that battles are won way before soldiers ever set foot on the field. The successful belligerant breaks the will of his foes long before breaking their bones.
This spell affects you as well as enemies
This spell is affected by ammunition skills
Ammunitions affect only ranged shots and spells that explicitely state so

Allows the Bearer to Cast Sacred Spells

"The bow handle is engraved with a harrowing symbol, a seal of purity and zeal. Closer inspection reveals thirteen small markings on the bow wings, like if the previous owner was keeping track of a grim score. Whoever it was, its legacy is not meant to end here: time to start big game hunting and keep the death toll rolling."

"The combat was fierce, but Brother Amren eventually met his end, crushed by the demon as his lifeless body was thrown across Greyharbour’s street. Yet, hope was not to die with the battle-priest. One of the four fishermen he was defending stepped forward and picked-up his shield to continue the fight. With him, the three other common-men charged the wounded demon while shouting their fear away. Neither the fishermen nor the demon survived the battle. An ode to these men’s sacrifice was engraved by the Brotherhood of Dawn on the edges of Amren’s aegis. This beacon of hope now awaits a new bearer worthy to keep up the fight against evil."

There is one city that makes the best steel in the four realms: Vulcaïn. This city-state is nested inside a Volcano which grants their deepest forge the temperature needed to melt, blend and purify the best metals. The resulting steel becomes pure, strong, and extremely sharp. To defend the city, their elite infantry are given rough jagged versions which captured some of the lava they were forged in.

Those who made a pact with Anulaï-Taï, Fallen Duke of Infinity, may rise inside the cult’s hierarchy and become a dreaded Time Devourer. Those sorcerers phase through space motionlessly while using their Time Seal to harness and destroy the normal continuum around them.
Goremaker, Shard of the Red Mountain

During the war of the Primordials, the eternal lovers Anathëa and Moros organized an assault on the Red Mountain, throne of Ashtaroth the lord of Flesh. Amidst the raging battle, the ground quaked as they realized the landscape itself was alive and about to engulf everything. They had no other choice than to obliterate the whole organic mountain to survive. This, could very well be one of its shards that survived through the eons.

Big Bill was a blacksmith apprentice. But repairing horses’ irons was boring for him, he dreamed himself as an evil-slashing hero with the sharpest axe the world had ever known. The blacksmithing prodigy got to work, every night he would hammer hard at the anvil, shaping his lethal ambitions into an axe he would call ‘Edgy’.\n\nRumor has it that Big Bill accidentally beheaded himself at night while training in the backyard. Yet, Edgy still remains a deadly work of art.

Bezeriel grew fond of observing a young beautiful maiden, incarnating all there is to love about youth. Taking the shape of a pale charming man, he offered her this ring to show his admiration for her.\n\nShe smiled as she put the ring to her finger, but it was not to last: Her skin started to wither, her lifeforce consumed and absorbed within the ring’s gem in a matter of seconds. Her body was never found for only dusts remained of her. The song of the “Lost maiden” that bards sing about, serve as the sole testimony of her doom.

"Isolated far east of the Four Realms of Men, the frontier city-state of Gomora is unfamously known for being the only settlement that openly welcomes evil worshippers. The champions in charge of keeping them in check are known as Arbiters, and receive such powerful onyx ring as a symbol of their absolute judgements."

"It would be impossible to determine who or what this uncanny tooth belonged to. When you first picked-it up, the ivory was of a pristine white. But now a faint coating of blood started to redden the canine by its base. Where is that blood coming from? Could it be yours? Only one thing is sure: it’s hungry, hungry for more."
Belt of the Owl Mighty Tester

Sheet1.Original text: My girlfriend accused me of cheating. I told her she was starting to sound like my wife.
Sheet1.Translated text: Má přítelkyně mě obvinila z podvádění, řekl jsem ji, že začíná mluvit jako moje žena.

Increases by %2 the duration of all the stun effects you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: Prodlužuje Tebou provedené omračující efekty o %2.

Sheet1.Original text: Reduces by %2 the duration of all the stun effects you take.
Sheet1.Translated text: Snižuje na Tobě provedené omračující efekty o %2.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to stun close enemies with ranged weapons (in a %2 range).
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance na omráčení blízkého protivníka zbraní na dálku (dosah %2).

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to knock-back close enemies with ranged weapons (in a %2 range).
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance na odkopnutí blízkého protivníka zbraní na dálku (dosah %2)

Sheet1.Original text: You can't be knocked-back by attacks blocked by %4
Sheet1.Translated text: Nemůžeš být odkopnut, pokud blokuješ štítem.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to knock-down enemies around you when dodgerolling.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance na sražení protivníka při úskoku

Sheet1.Original text: You can't be knocked-down by attacks blocked by %4.
Sheet1.Translated text: Nemůžeš být sražen, pokud blokuješ štítem.

Sheet1.Original text: You get back on your feet faster after a knock-down.
Sheet1.Translated text: Rychleji se postavíš, pokud si byl sražen.

Sheet1.Original text: You can return a knock-down effect to its source with %4.
Sheet1.Translated text: Sražení můžeš vrátit útočníkovi, pokud použiješ štít včas.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to physical impulse chance with impulsion skills.
%1 chance to expulse enemies on hit.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance na úprk protivníka při zásahu

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to knock-down enemies on hit.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance na sražení protivníka při zásahu

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to knock-down stunned enemies during %2 when hitting them.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance na sražení omráčeného protivníka na %2 po zásahu

Sheet1.Original text: Grants you a gladiator stack (%1 to attack speed and %2 to physical damage) each time you kill somebody successively. Those stacks are removed when your killing chain stops.
Sheet1.Translated text: Dá Ti navýšení Gladiátor (%1 více obratnosti a %2 více síly) při Krveprolití. Navýšení se ruší, pokud Krveprolití skončí.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to the maximum number of your gladiator stacks.
%2 to the duration of your gladiators stacks and killing chain.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 delší trvání Tvých navýšení Gladiátor a Krveprolití

Sheet1.Original text: Casting fire spells gives you ardent stacks which can inflict burn stacks to enemies around you.
Sheet1.Translated text: Sesláním ohnivých kouzel obdržíš navýšení Žhavý, které nechá protivníky po určitou dobu hořet přes čas.

Sheet1.Original text: Each ardent stack increases your fire damage and chance to inflict burning stacks.
Sheet1.Translated text: Každé navýšení Žhavý zvedá Tvé ohnivé poškození a šanci na zapálení.

Sheet1.Original text: You gain ardent stacks faster, but reaching the maximum will cast a fire nova that harms enemies and yourself, removing all your stacks.
Sheet1.Translated text: Rychleji obdržíš navýšení Žhavý. Při dosažení maxima navýšení se spustí Ohnivý výboj, který zraní Tebe a Tvé protivníky. Všechny navýšení se tím spotřebují.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to your thorns damage for each enemy in a %2 radius.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 zvýšené poškození Trny za každého protivníka v okruhu %2

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to your thorns damage during %2 each time you hit an enemy (stackable %3 times).
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 k poškození Trny na %2 po zásahu protivníka  (%3x navýšení)

Sheet1.Original text: Deprecated magic effect - should not appear in the game.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zastaralý magický efekt (neměl by se ve hře objevit)

Sheet1.Original text: This skill description shouldn't appear in the game.
Sheet1.Translated text: Popis této dovednosti by se neměl objevit ve hře.

Sheet1.Original text: Creates a storm area each time you hit the same area with elemental attacks (stackable intensity). Will help you propagate elemental effects when hitting enemies inside a storm area.
Sheet1.Translated text: Vyvolá bleskovou bouři pokaždé, pokud zasáhneš stejnou oblast bleskovým kouzlem (navyšovací intenzita). V této zóně mohou být protivníci omráčeni.

Sheet1.Original text: Increases by %1 the duration of all your storm areas.
Grants you a %2 elemental damage stack for each storm stack when you're in a storm area.
Sheet1.Translated text: Dá Ti %2 navýšení element. poškození za každé navýšení bouře, pokud se nacházíš v oblasti bouře (druh elementu závisí na druhu bouře).

Sheet1.Original text: Grants you a %2 elemental resistance stack for each storm stack when you're in a storm area.
Sheet1.Translated text: Dá Ti %2 navýšení element. odolnosti za každé navýšení bouře, pokud se nacházíš v oblasti bouře (druh elementu závisí na druhu bouře).

Sheet1.Original text: You always benefit from the protective storm and destructive storm bonus of your active storm which has the most stacks, even if you are not in a storm area.
Sheet1.Translated text: Bonus ochranné a ničivé bouře platí pro všechny bouře, i když se v oblasti bouře nenacházíš.

Sheet1.Original text: Increases by %2 the range of your dash.
Increases by %2 the speed of your dash.
Increases by %2 the damage done by your dash.
Your dash generates rage on hits.
Increases by %2 the critical chance of your dash.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 zvýšená šance na kritický zásah při výpadu

Sheet1.Original text: Increases by %2 the critical damage of your dash.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 zvýšený násobič kritického poškození při výpadu

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the damage of your dash during %1 for each rage point you spend.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 zvýšené poškození výpadu za každý bod Zuřivosti který si spotřeboval v posledních %2.

Sheet1.Original text: Instantly heal %1 of your health when performing a dash.
Sheet1.Translated text: Okamžitě vyléčí %1 Tvého života při výpadu.

Sheet1.Original text: Your dash may hit several enemies around your target.
Sheet1.Translated text: Výpad může zasáhnout více cílů kolem Tebe.

Sheet1.Original text: Reduces by %2 the cooldown of your dash.
Snares by %1 during %2 all enemies hit by your dash.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance na chycení protivníka do pasti po výpadu na %2.

Sheet1.Original text: Cancels your current dash cooldown on each kill and increase your dash critical chance by %1 during %2.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zruší aktuální dobíjecí čas výpadu při každém zabití a zvýší šanci na kritické poškození výpadu o %1 na  %2.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the range of your melee weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k dosahu Tvých zbraní na blízko

Sheet1.Original text: Heals you from %2 of all the thorns damage you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 z poškození udělené Trny Tě vyléčí.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to physical resistance when channeling an attack, with an extra %1 if you're blocking with your shield.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k fyzické odolnosti, pokud provádíš usměrněný útok (channeling), a navíc %1, pokud blokuješ štítem.

Sheet1.Original text: The critical chance bonus given by your agility level is %2 higher.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zvyšuje o %2 vliv obratnosti na Tvou šanci kritického zásahu.

Sheet1.Original text: Critical strikes have a small chance to instantly kill common enemies.
Sheet1.Translated text: Kritický zásah má malou šanci na okamžité zabití obyčejných nepřátel.

Sheet1.Original text: Increases by %2 your critical chance (weapons & spells) against enemies who don't target you.
Sheet1.Translated text: O %2 zvýšená šance na kritický zásah (Kouzla a Fyzické) proti nepřátelům, kteří Tě nezaměřují.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to attack speed, spellcasting speed and move speed during %2 each time you kill an uncommon enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 k rychlosti útoku, kouzlení a pohybu na %2 potom, co zabiješ vzácného protivníka.

Sheet1.Original text: Critical strikes inflict %1 weakness stacks for %2.
Sheet1.Translated text: Kritický zásah sníží všem cílům odolnosti o %1 po dobu %2.

Sheet1.Original text: Gives all your shots an protection piercing bonus (physical) depending on your distance to the target (up to %1 if the target is closer than %2).
Sheet1.Translated text: Přidá všem Tvým střelám bonus na proražení v závislosti na vzdálenosti k cíli (až %1 pokud je cíl blže než %2)

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your poison damage rate against enemies who already suffer from frailty stacks.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k míře jedového poškození proti nepřátelům, kteří trpí násobky křehkosti.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the duration of all the curse stacks you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k trvání všech násobků prokletí, které způsobíš.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to inflict curse with shadow damage.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci způsobit prokletí stínovým poškozením.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the propagation radius of your cursing stacks.
%1 to the number of status ailments stacks propagated by your cursing stacks.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 k počtu násobků chorob stavu šířených násobky prokletí.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to inflict burn with fire damage.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci způsobit popálení ohnivým poškozením.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to inflict freeze with frost damage.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci způsobit zmrazení ledovým poškozením.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to inflict bleed with rend damage.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci způsobit krvácení tržným poškozením.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the duration of all the bleeding stacks you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k trvání všech násobků krvácení, které způsobíš.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to inflict poison with toxic damage.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci způsobit otrávení jedovatým poškozením.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the duration of all the poison stacks you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k trvání všech násobků otrávení, které způsobíš.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the duration of all the weakness stacks you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k trvání všech násobků slabosti,  které způsobíš.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to inflict weakness with sacred damage.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci způsobit slabost posvátným poškozením.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the duration of all the frailty stacks you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k trvání všech násobků křehkosti,  které způsobíš.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to inflict frailty with umbra damage.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci způsobit křehkost umbra poškozením.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to curse your target during %2 on hits.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance proklít cíl během %2 při zásazích.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to cause a %2 frenzy when fearing a stunned enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance způsobit %2 zběsilost při vystrašení omráčeného cíle.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to fear all enemies in a %2 radius when performing a physical overkill.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance vystrašit všechny nepřátele v %2 okruhu při provedení fyzického přizabití.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your curse efficiency against enemies who already suffer from weakness stacks.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k účinnosti prokletí proti cíli, který trpí násobky slabosti.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the drop rate of health globes.
Inflict %1 poison stack(s) during %2 on hits with melee and ranged weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: Způsobí %1 násobky jedu během %2 při zásazích zbraněmi zblízka a na dálku.

Sheet1.Original text: Inflict %1 curse stack(s) during %2 on hits with melee and ranged weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: Způsobí %1 násobky prokletí během %2 při zásazích zbraněmi zblízka a na dálku.

Sheet1.Original text: Inflict %1 frailty and weakness stack(s) during %2 on hits with melee and ranged weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: Způsobí %1 násobky křehkosti během %2 při zásazích zbraněmi zblízka a na dálku.

Sheet1.Original text: Inflict %1 burning stack(s) during %2 on hits with melee and ranged weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: Způsobí %1 násobky popálení během %2 při zásazích zbraněmi zblízka a na dálku.

Sheet1.Original text: Shock targets on hits with melee and ranged weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: Šokuje nepřátele na zásah zbraněmi zblízka a na dálku.

Sheet1.Original text: Inflict %1 bleed stack(s) during %2 on hits with melee and ranged weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: Způsobí %1 násobky krvácení během %2 při zásazích zbraněmi zblízka a na dálku.

Sheet1.Original text: Freeze targets during %2 on hits with melee and ranged weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zmrazí cíl během %2 na zásah zbraněmí zblízka a na dálku.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to all damage done with ranged weapons if there is no enemy around you in a %2 radius.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 k veškerému poškození se zbraněmi na dálku, pokud není poblíž nepřítel v okruhu %.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 rage generated on first hit with melee and ranged weapons when you are not in a fight.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 zuřivosti tvořené na první zásah se zbraněmi na blízko a na dálku když nejsi v boji.

Sheet1.Original text: Increases rage generation of your ranged shots the further you are from your target.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zvyšuje tvoření zuřivosti tvých střel čím dál si od cíle.

Sheet1.Original text: Increases your critical chance (weapons & spells) the further you are from your target.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zvyšuje krit. šanci (zbraní a kouzel) čím dál si od cíle.

Sheet1.Original text: The first hit done or taken doesn't put you in fight mode (%2 cooldown).
Sheet1.Translated text: První zásah který způsobíš nebo utrpíš nezačne režim souboje (%2 čas nabíjení).

Sheet1.Original text: Daggers damage are increased by your agility instead of your ferocity.
Sheet1.Translated text: Poškození dýkami je zvýšeno hbitostí namísto dravostí.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to gain %2 health points on kills.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance získat %2 bodů života na zabití.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to gain %2 umbra points on kills.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance získat %2 bodů umbra na zabití.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to gain %2 rage points on kills.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance získat %2 bodů zuřivosti na zabití.

Sheet1.Original text: You can block all incoming attacks, even magical ones.
Sheet1.Translated text: Můžeš blokovat veškeré příchozí poškození, dokonce magické.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 has a %1 chance to return incoming projectiles.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 má %1 šanci odrazit zpět příchozí projektily.

Sheet1.Original text: You can no longer attack when cloaked by %4, but the effect lasts longer and allows you to move through enemies.
Sheet1.Translated text: Nemůžeš útočit při maskování %4, ale efekt trvá déle a můžeš procházet skrz nepřátele.

Sheet1.Original text: In passive mode, %4 decreases your presence level.
Sheet1.Translated text: V pasivním řežimu ti %4 snižuje úroveň přítomnosti.

Sheet1.Original text: When using %4 to get into offensive mode, you perform a 360° attack with your equipped weapons. Increases offensive mode cooldown.
Sheet1.Translated text: Při přepnutí %4 do útočného režimu provedeš 360° útok s vybavenými zbraněmi. Zvyšuje čas nabíjení útočného režimu.

Sheet1.Original text: When using %4 to get into defensive mode, you repel all enemies around you. Increases defensive mode cooldown.
Sheet1.Translated text: Při přepnutí %4 do obraného režimu odrazíš všechny nepřátele okolo. Zvyšuje čas nabíjení obraného režimu.

Sheet1.Original text: When %4 is in offensive mode, you generate more rage when hitting enemies.
Sheet1.Translated text: Když je %4 v útočném režimu, tvoříš víc zuřivosti při zasažení nepřátel.

Sheet1.Original text: When %4 is in defensive mode, you generate rage when receiving hits from enemies.
Sheet1.Translated text: Když je %4 v obraného režimu, tvoříš zuřivost při zasažení nepřáteli.

Sheet1.Original text: Using %4 also reduces the umbra and rage costs of all your spells.
Sheet1.Translated text: Užívání %4 snižuje ceny umbry a zuřivosti u kouzel.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 will steal umbra for each enemy surrounding you at launch.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 ukradne umbru za každého nepřítele okolo při seslání.

Sheet1.Original text: You can place one more trap on the ground with %4 and have one extra charge to use.
Sheet1.Translated text: Můžeš položit o jednu past navíc s %4 a máš o jedno použítí navíc.

Sheet1.Original text: You can place traps away from you with %4, not necessarily at your feet.
Sheet1.Translated text: Můžeš položit pasti dál od sebe s %4, nejen u nohou.

Sheet1.Original text: When activated, %4 traps leave an area on the ground which inflict frailty stacks to nearby enemies.
Sheet1.Translated text: Při aktivování,pasti %4 způsobují násobky křehkosti blízkým nepřátelům.

Sheet1.Original text: When you are invisible, you can use potions and phials without spending their charges, even if they are empty.
Sheet1.Translated text: Při neviditelnosti můžeš používát nápoje a lahvičky bez jejich Použití, ikdyž jsou prázdné.

Sheet1.Original text: Reduces your presence level by %2 if all your equipped armor parts are of the light type.
Sheet1.Translated text: Snižuje úroveň přítomnosti o %2 jestli veškeré vybavení brnění je součástí lehkého typu.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to your presence level during %2 each time you kill an enemy (stackable %3 times).
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 k úrovni přítomnosti během %2 za každé zabití nepřítele (násobitelné %3 krát)

Sheet1.Original text: If your presence exceeds %1, you gain a bonus to all damage you inflict depending on your total presence level.
Sheet1.Translated text: Jestliže tvá přítomnost překročí %1, získáš bonus k veškerému poškozené podle celkové úrovně přítomnosti.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all direct damage done (not including status ailments).
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k celkovému přímému poškození (choroby stavy se nepočítají).

Sheet1.Original text: Your ranged shots have a %1 chance to bounce when hitting walls or terrain.
Sheet1.Translated text: Tvé střely mají %1 šanci se odrazit od stěn a terénu.

Sheet1.Original text: Ranged shots that bounce on walls have a %1 chance to split into 3 projectiles.
Sheet1.Translated text: Střely které se odráží od stěn mají %1 šanci se rozdělit na 3 projektily.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 traps make use of your active ammunitions when they explode.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 pasti jsou ovlivněny aktivní municí při explozi.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to purge all current resource transfers in %2 when hitting an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance vrátit všechny aktuálni přeměny zdrojů v %2 při zasažení nepřítele.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to purge all current umbra transfers in %2  when hitting an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance vrátit všechny aktuálni přeměny umbry v %2 při zasažení nepřítele.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to purge all current rage transfers in %2  when hitting an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance vrátit všechny aktuálni přeměny zuřivosti v %2 při zasažení nepřítele.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to instantly cancel all current resource transfers when hitting an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance okamžitě zrušit všechny aktuálni přeměny zdrojů při zasažení nepřítele.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to instantly cancel all current umbra transfers when hitting an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance okamžitě zrušit všechny aktuálni přeměny umbry při zasažení nepřítele.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to instantly cancel all current rage transfers when hitting an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance okamžitě zrušit všechny aktuálni přeměny zuřivosti při zasažení nepřítele.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to purge all current resource transfers in %2 when being hit by an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance vrátit všechny aktuálni přeměny zdrojů v %2 při zasažení nepřítelem.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to purge all current umbra transfers in %2  when being hit by an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance vrátit všechny aktuálni přeměny umbry v %2 při zasažení nepřítelem.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to purge all current rage transfers in %2  when being hit by an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance vrátit všechny aktuálni přeměny zuřivosti v %2 při zasažení nepřítelem.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to instantly cancel all current resource transfers when being hit by an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance okamžitě zrušit všechny aktuálni přeměny zdrojů při zasažení nepřítelem.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to instantly cancel all current umbra transfers when being hit by an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance okamžitě zrušit všechny aktuálni přeměny umbry při zasažení nepřítelem.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to instantly cancel all current rage transfers when being hit by an enemy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance okamžitě zrušit všechny aktuálni přeměny zuřivosti při zasažení nepřítelem.

Sheet1.Original text: You can perform multiple melee hits per strike with this weapon.
Sheet1.Translated text: S touto zbraní můžeš provést několik zásahu v jednom úderu.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the drop chance of globes on bleeding enemies.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci na padnutí glóbů při nehýbání.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your blocking chance when you are not moving.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci na blok při nehýbání.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your blocking chance when you are moving.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci na blok při pohybu.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your blocking chance against fire attacks.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci na blok ohnivého poškození.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to critical chance (weapons & spells) against enemies whose health is below %1.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 ke krit. Šanci (zbraně a kouzla) proti nepřátelům jejíchž životy jsou pod %1.

Sheet1.Original text: Blocking a fire attack will give you fire attacks during %2.
Sheet1.Translated text: Blokování ohnivého útoku ti dá ohnivé útoky během %2.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 chance %4 when killing an enemy if you are under %1 of your maximum health.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 šance %4 při zabití nepřítele když jsi pod %1 max. života.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 have a chance to gain one charge each time you perform a critical strike.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 má šanci získat jedno Použití pokaždé když provedeš kritický zásah.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 have a higher number of charges available and generates them faster, but reaching 0 will trigger a cooldown during which charges don't regenerate.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 má větší počet použití a tvoří je rychleji, ale dosáhnutí 0 použití spustí čas nabíjení během kterého se použití netvoří.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 have a higher number of charges available.
%4 have a chance to gain charges each time you perform a dodgeroll.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 má vetší šanci získat použití pokaždé když provedeš vyhnutí.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 regains charges each time you cycle through the different ammunitions.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 získá zpět použití pokaždé když cykluješ jinými municemi.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all damage done with swords and broadswords.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k veškerému poškození s meči a velemeči.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all damage done with axes and battleaxes.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k veškerému poškození se sekerami a bitevními sekerami.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all damage done with hammers and warhammers.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k veškerému poškození s kladivy a válečnými kladivy.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all damage done with shields.
%2 to all damage done with daggers.
%2 to all damage done with staves.
%2 to all damage done with crossbows.
Each critical hit done with a sword or broadsword may temporarily increase your attack speed.
Sheet1.Translated text: Každý kritický zásah s mečem nebo velemečem může dočasně zvýšít rychlost útoku.

Sheet1.Original text: Each critical hit done with a hammer or warhammer may stun your target.
Sheet1.Translated text: Každý kritický zásah s kladivem a válečným kladivem může omráčit cíl.

Sheet1.Original text: Each critical hit done with an axe or battleaxe may inflict one bleeding stack to your target.
Sheet1.Translated text: Každý kritický zásah se sekerou nebo bitevní sekerou může způsobit jeden násobek krvácení cíli.

Sheet1.Original text: Each critical hit done with a shield may trigger a temporary defense boost.
Sheet1.Translated text: Každý kritický zásah se může spustit dočasné posílení obrany.

Sheet1.Original text: Each critical hit done with a dagger may ignore part of your target's physical protection.
Sheet1.Translated text: Každý kritický zásah s dýkou může ignorovat fyzickou ochranu cíle.

Sheet1.Original text: Each critical hit done with a crossbow may shatter your target's physical protection.
Sheet1.Translated text: Každý kritický zásah s kuší může roztříštit fyzickou ochranu cíle.

Sheet1.Original text: Each critical hit done with a staff may replenish your umbra.
Sheet1.Translated text: Každý kritický zásah s holí může doplnit umbru.

Sheet1.Original text: You can now block attacks with any kind of melee weapons, not necessarily shields.
Sheet1.Translated text: Můžeš nyní blokovat útoky s jakoukoliv zbraní zblízka, nejen se štíty.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to perform overkills.
%1 to your presence level during %2 each time you block an attack (stackable %3 times).
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 k úrovni přítomnosti během %2 za každý úspěšný blok (násobitelné %3 krát)

Sheet1.Original text: If your presence exceeds %1, you gain a critical damage bonus (weapons & spells) depending on your total presence level.
Sheet1.Translated text: Pokud úroveň přítomnosti překročí %1, získáš bonus krit. Poškození (zbraně a kouzla) podle tvé celkové úrovně přítomnosti.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to your presence level if your rage is full (bonus decreasing linearly with your rage level).
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 k úrovni přítomnosti při plné Zuřivosti (bonus se snižuje spolu s množstvím zuřivosti)

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the duration of the various bonus you gain when performing an overkill.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k trvání různých bonusů které získáš přizabitím.

Sheet1.Original text: Overkills now grant you a temporary %2 ferocity bonus on top of their other effects.
Sheet1.Translated text: Přizabití nyní dočasně přidá %2 hbitosti, navíc k ostatním efektům.

Sheet1.Original text: Overkills now grant you a temporary %2 toughness bonus on top of their other effects.
Sheet1.Translated text: Přizabití nyní dočasně přidá %2 houževnatosti, navíc k ostatním efektům.

Sheet1.Original text: Overkills now grant you a temporary %2 willpower bonus on top of their other effects.
Sheet1.Translated text: Přizabití nyní dočasně přidá %2 vůle, navíc k ostatním efektům.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all damage done with one-handed weapons (stackable when dual-wielding)
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k veškerému poškození s jednoručními zbraněmí (násobitelné s oběma zbraněmi)

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all damage done with two-handed weapons (including staves).
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k veškerému poškození s obouručními zbraněmí (včetně holí)

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the duration of the frenzy effects you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k trvání efektů zběsilosti, které způsobíš

Sheet1.Original text: Frenzied enemies have increased damage while the frenzy lasts.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zběsilí nepřátelé mají zvýšené poškození dokud přetrvává zběsilost.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 chance to inflict %1 weakness stacks when inflicting frenzy.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 šance způsobit %1 násobky slabosti při způsobení zběsilosti.

Sheet1.Original text: When you are cursed, you propagate status ailments to everyone around you, not just you allies anymore.
Sheet1.Translated text: Když jsi proklet, šíříš choroby stavu na všechny okolo, nejen na spojence.

Sheet1.Original text: When a frenzied enemy kills someone, its frenzy duration is increased.
Sheet1.Translated text: Když zběsilý nepřítel někoho zabije, trvání jeho zběsilosti se prodlouží.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 chance to generate a corpse when killing an enemy.
%2 chance to generate a corpse when performing an overkill.
When an overkill generate corpses, you have a %2 chance to drop %1 extra corpse(s).
Sheet1.Translated text: Když přizabití vytvoří mrtvoly, máš %2 šanci na další %1 mrtvoly.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 can consume more corpses and reach them further.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 může požít více mrtvol a dosáhnout na ně dál.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 will have a larger explosion radius for each consumed corpse.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 teď má větší explozi za každou požitou mrtvolu.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 regenerates your umbra each time it consumes a corpse.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 regeneruje umbru pokaždé co požije mrtvolu.

Sheet1.Original text: Corpses now keep trace of the status ailments their owners were suffering before dying, which can affect the properties of all spells which use corpses.
Sheet1.Translated text: Mrtvoly teď sledují jaké měli choroby stavu majitele před smrtí, což může ovlivnit vlastnosti všech kouzel které používají mrtvoly.

Sheet1.Original text: When a frenzied enemy kills someone, it inflicts %1 curse stacks to itself.
Sheet1.Translated text: Když zběsilý nepřítel někoho zabije, způsobí sobě %1 násobků prokletí.

Sheet1.Original text: Your dash now leaves a temporary poisoning trail on its path.
Your dash and its trail consume corpses along the way and heal you for each one consumed.
Sheet1.Translated text: Sprint a jeho stopa požívají mrtvoly a lečí za každou pozitou mrtvolu.

Sheet1.Original text: Greatly reduces the umbra cost of %4, but using the spell will inflict poison stacks to yourself as well as enemies.
Sheet1.Translated text: Velice sníží cenu umbry %4, ale používání kouzla způsobí násobky otrávení tobě i nepřátelům.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 has a wider range and inflicts poison stacks at a higher rate.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 má větší rozsah a působí násobky otrávení ve větší míře.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 greatly increases your toughness while active.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 velice zvýší houževnatost dokud je aktivní.

Sheet1.Original text: While %4 is active, the poison trail of your dash lasts longer.
Sheet1.Translated text: Dokud je %4 aktivní, jedovatá stopa sprintu trvá déle.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 has a chance to restitute a part of consumed corpses when it explodes.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 má šanci navrátit část požitých mrtvol při explozi.

%2 of toxic damage you inflict are converted to shadow.
%2 of toxic damage you inflict are converted to rend.
%2 of toxic damage you inflict are converted to physical.
Critical hits with shadow damage always inflict curse.
Sheet1.Translated text: Kritické útoky stínovým poškozením vždy působí prokletí.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the duration of all the fear effects you inflict.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k trvání všech efektů strachu, které způsobíš.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your presence level when your are cursed, poisoned or bleeding.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k úrovni přítomnosti při prokletí, otrávení nebo krvácení.

Sheet1.Original text: Inflicting frailty stacks prevents your target from regenerating its health over time.
Sheet1.Translated text: Působení násobků křehkosti znemožňuje cíli regenerovat život po jejich dobu.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to health regeneration for each poisoned enemy surrounding you (%2 radius).
Sheet1.Translated text: K reregeneraci života za každého otráveného nepřítele okolo tebe (%2 okruh).

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all damage inflicted by your status ailments.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k veškerému poškození způsobené chorobami stavu.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 can now have up to 3 marked targets at the same time (you still need to mark them separately).
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 teď může mít až 3 označené cíle najednou (označit je musíš jednotlivě).

Sheet1.Original text: When an enemy marked by %4 dies, the mark may jump to another enemy in a %2 radius.
Sheet1.Translated text: Když nepřítel označený %4 zemře, jeho označení poskočí na dalšího nepřítele v okruhu %2.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to perform overkills against enemies marked by %4.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci provést přizabití nepřátel označených %4.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to generate corpses when killing enemies marked by %4.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci tvoření mrtvol při zabiti nepřátel označených %4.

Sheet1.Original text: You have a small chance to instantly kill common enemies marked by %4.
Sheet1.Translated text: Máš malou šanci okamžitě zabít běžné nepřátele označené %4.

Sheet1.Original text: When your total presence is below %1, you gain a health regeneration bonus the lower your presence is (up to %2 if your presence is null).
Sheet1.Translated text: Když je tvá celková úroveň přítomnosti pod %1, získáváš bonus k regeneraci zdraví čím měnší tvá přítomnost je (až do 2% pokud je tvá přítomnost na nule).

Sheet1.Original text: When your total presence is below %1, you gain an attack speed and spellcasting speed bonus the lower your presence is (up to %2 if your presence is null).
Sheet1.Translated text: Když je tvá celková úroveň přítomnosti pod %1, získáváš bonus k rychlosti útoku a sesílání kouzel čím menší tvá přítomnost je (až do 2% pokud je tvá přítomnost na nule).

Sheet1.Original text: When your total presence is above %1, you gain a dodge chance bonus depending on your total presence.
Sheet1.Translated text: Když je tvá celková úroveň přítomnosti nad %1, získáváš bonus k šanci na vyhnutí podle tvé celkové přítomnosti.

Sheet1.Original text: Increases by %2 the critical damage multiplier of your dash against enemies marked by %4.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zvyšuje o 2% násobič krit. poškození tvého sprintu proti nepřátelům označených %4.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to perform overkills with critical strikes.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci provést přizabití s krit. útoky.

Sheet1.Original text: Overkills now grant you a temporary %2 agility bonus on top of their other effects.
Sheet1.Translated text: Přizabití ti dočasně přidá %2 ke hbitosti spolu s dalšími jeho efekty.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 goes through enemies and may drag several simultaneous targets.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 prochází skrz nepřátele a může táhnout několik cílů najednou.

Sheet1.Original text: Using %4 by maintaining the key will drag you towards your target instead of dragging your target towards you.
Sheet1.Translated text: Užívání %4 podržením tlačíka tě přitáhne k cíli místo naopak.

Sheet1.Original text: Increases the number of bleeding stacks inflicted by %4 and their duration.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zvyšuje počet a trvání násobků krvácení způsobených %4.

Sheet1.Original text: Increases by %1 the maximum number of combo hits you can perform with weapons.
Sheet1.Translated text: Zvyšuje maximální počet kombo zásahu se zbraní o %1.

Sheet1.Original text: When landing on you, a target hooked by %4 will receive an extra damage base on your equipped weapons which has high chance to inflict stun.
Sheet1.Translated text: Při přitáhnutí cíle %4 dostane další poškození podle vybavených zbraní, což má velkou šanci způsobit omráčení.

Sheet1.Original text: %4 summons 3 chains instead of one, allowing you to hit a higher number of targets.
Sheet1.Translated text: %4 vrhne 3 řetezy namísto jednoho, což umožňuje zasáhnout více cílů najednou.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to all damage done with pistols.
%1 chance to gain %2 umbra points on hits.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance získat %2 umbra bodů za zásah.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 chance to gain %2 umbra points on received hits.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance získat %2 umbra bodů za příchozí zásah.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to your chance to inflict stun with physical damage.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci způsobit omráčení fyzickým poškozením.

Sheet1.Original text: Your rage generation when hitting enemies is reverted, generating umbra instead.
Sheet1.Translated text: Tvá regenerace Zuřivosti při zásahu nepřátel nyní regeneruje Umbru.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the drop rate of umbra globes.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci na padnutí umbra glóbů.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the drop rate of rage globes.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k šanci na padnutí glóbů zuřivosti.

Sheet1.Original text: Umbra globes will instantly refill %2 of your total umbra.
Sheet1.Translated text: Umbra glóby okamžitě obnoví %2 celkové umbry.

Sheet1.Original text: Rage globes will instantly refill %2 of your total rage and will trigger your rage conservation.
Sheet1.Translated text: Glóby zuřivosti okamžitě obnoví %2 celkové zuřivosti a spustí zachování zuřivosti.

Sheet1.Original text: Your health regeneration is applied to your umbra regeneration.
Sheet1.Translated text: Regenerace života je nyní aplikována na regenerace Umbry.

Sheet1.Original text: Gives you a melee damage bonus depending on your total willpower.
Sheet1.Translated text: Přidává bonus k poškození zblízka podle celkové vůle.

Sheet1.Original text: Enemies hit by your dash are repelled.
Your dash inflicts umbral damage instead of physical.
Sheet1.Translated text: Sprint působí umbra poškození namísto fyzického.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to the umbra cost of spells when you are in fight mode.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k ceně umbra kouzel v bojovém řežimu.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to movement speed when your umbra is full.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k rychlosti pohybu při plné umbře.

Sheet1.Original text: %2 to attack speed (melee & ranged) when your umbra is full.
Sheet1.Translated text: %2 k rychlosti útoku (zblízka a na dálku) při plné umbře.

Sheet1.Original text: %1 to gain %2 umbra when performing an umbral overkill.
Sheet1.Translated text: %1 šance získat %2 umbry při přizabití umbrou.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to attack speed, spellcasting speed and movement speed.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] rychlost útoku, rychlosti kouzlení a rychlosti pohybu.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]%2%[/bonus] to the umbra and rage costs of spells.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]%2%[/bonus] cena umbry a zuřivosti u kouzel.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] physical damage and suspended umbra generation.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] fyzické poškození a pozdržené tvoření umbry.

Sheet1.Original text: Your next hit will be critical.
Your next dash will be free (it won't activate a cooldown).
Sheet1.Translated text: Další sprint nebude stát bod výdrže a nebude aktivován čas nabíjení

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to your physical damage and attack speed.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k fyzickému poškození a rychlosti útoku

Sheet1.Original text: Your next dodge will be successful.
[bonus]+%2[/bonus] to your dodge chance and critical damage (armes).
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k šanci na vyhnutí a kritickému poškození (zbraně)

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to your attack speed and critical damage (armes).
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k rychlosti útoku a kritickému poškození (zbraně)

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]%2%[/bonus] chance to burn enemies around you each second.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] šanci na popálení nepřátel okolo každou sekundu.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to defensive ability. \N[malus]-%2%[/malus] to movement speed.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] ke schopnosti obrany. \N[malus]-%2%[/malus] k rychlosti pohybu.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to attack speed. \N[malus]-%2%[/malus] to defense. \Nincreases generated rage on hits.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k rychlosti útoku. \N[malus]-%2%[/malus] k obraně. \Nzvyšuje tvořenou zuřilost na zásah.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to defensive ability. \N[malus]-%2%[/malus] to movement speed. \Nincreases generated rage on received hits.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] ke schopnosti obrany. . \N[malus]-%2%[/malus] k rychlosti pohybu. \Nzvyšuje tvořenou zuřilost na zásah.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to spells resistance. \Nincreases your umbra regeneration.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k odolnosti proti kouzlům. \Nzvyšuje regeneraci umbry.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to spells damage. \N[bonus]-%2%[/bonus] to rage and umbra costs of spells.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k poškození kouzly. \N[bonus]-%2%[/bonus] k ceně zuřivosti a umbry kouzel.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to move speed. \N[bonus]-%2%[/bonus] to presence. \N[malus]-%2%[/malus] to defense.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k rychlosti pohybu. \N[bonus]-%2%[/bonus] k přítomnosti \N[malus]-%2%[/malus] k obraně.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to toxic damage. \N[bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to toxic resistance.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k jedovatému poškození. \N[bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k odolnosti proti jedu.

Sheet1.Original text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] to toxic damage. \N[bonus]+%2[/bonus] to toxic resistance. \N[bonus]+10%[/bonus] to toughness.
Sheet1.Translated text: [bonus]+%2%[/bonus] k jedovatému poškození.  \N[bonus]+%2[/bonus]  k odolnosti proti jedu. \N[bonus]+10%[/bonus] k houževnatosti.
